polytech.devint.controller

Class DevintController<M extends Model,V extends DevintView<M>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • polytech.devint.event.Observable
      • polytech.devint.controller.Controller<M,V>
        • polytech.devint.controller.DevintController<M,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    M - Model that the controller can manage.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SwingMenuController

    public abstract class DevintController<M extends Model,V extends DevintView<M>>
extends Controller<M,V>
    Represents a specific controller for DeViNT developers. All mandatory functionality are present. This controller need to have registered at least one main view (using the registerMainView(View v) method. The palette and font change need to be implemented in every view to work. A default behavior of the escape key is present. It may be overridden (override onEscape method).
    Author:
    Loris Friedel

      • onEscape

        public void onEscape(EscapeEvent escapeEvent)
        Method called when the escape key is pressed. The default behavior of this method is to destroy the current views and initialize all registered main views.
        Parameters:
        escapeEvent - Event triggered when the escape key is being pressed.

      • registerMainView

        public static void registerMainView(View<?> view)
        Add a main view in the devint controller class. This view will be called when the space key will be pressed.
        Parameters:
        view - View to be added to the list of main views.

      • unregisterMainView

        public static void unregisterMainView(View<?> view)
        Remove a main view in the devint controller class.
        Parameters:
        view - View to be removed to the list of main views.
